original_text: And if he has no daughter, then you shall give his inheritance to his brothers.
korean_text: 딸도 없으면 그의 기업을 그의 형제에게 줄 것이요

sentences.original_text: And if he has no daughter
then you shall give his inheritance to his brothers.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 너희는 그의 유산을 그의 형제들에게 주어야 한다.
